Tom,
Any idea of how the oshigata are actually drawn?  Looks like mottled g=
ray paper, the usual ink cake for the outline... opaque white pigment (goua=
che?) for the hamon?  Not sure how the hada is drawn in other than by lots =
of sharp pencil work.  Interesting way of representing utsuri and antai.  R=
eality can be marked on paper in many different ways.  I wonder if Nagayama=
-sensei's methods will catch on.  Certainly different.

Jim
